generic.output:
\n ,
# PANTALLA
altimeter-std bool %d /instrumentation/altimeter/std
altimeter-inHg bool %d /instrumentation/altimeter/inhg
altitude-hpa int %04d /output/EFIS/formatted-setting-hpa
altitude-inhg float %05.2f output/EFIS/formatted-setting-inhg
#LED EFIS
CSTR bool %d /instrumentation/efis/inputs/CSTR
WPT bool %d /instrumentation/efis/inputs/wpt
VORD bool %d /instrumentation/efis/inputs/VORD
NDB bool %d /instrumentation/efis/inputs/NDB
ARPT bool %d /instrumentation/efis/inputs/arpt
FD bool %d /it-autoflight/output/fd1
LS bool %d /modes/pfd/ILS1
#LED warnings
MAST_WARN bool %d /ECAM/warnings/master-caution-light
MAST_WARN_FLASH bool %d /ECAM/warnings/master-warning-flash
MAST_CAUT bool %d /ECAM/warnings/master-caution-light
AUTOLAND bool %d /instrumentation/pfd/lights/autoland-on
